description: IBM MQ 9.0 LTS, 9.1 LTS, 9.2 LTS, 9.3 LTS and 9.3 CD, in certain configurations, is vulnerable to a denial of service attack caused by an error processing messages when an API Exit using MQBUFMH is used.  IBM X-Force ID:  290259.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: 9.0 LTS, 9.1 LTS, 9.2 LTS, 9.3 LTS and 9.3 CD
